attributes.action: stop Manchester Airport from charging vehicles picking-up or dropping-off passengers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last year Manchester Airport introduced a scheme of charging each vehicle picking up passengers from Terminal 1, which has let to delay and confusion.  Any expantion of this scheme should be stopped and the current implementation reversed.  If additional revenue is required to improve airport facilities, it should be drawn from the airport tax system.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
